parameters.description: Works only with custom setup of cluster. Allow impersonation of test users (Required if Impersonate-Group is set)
parameters.name: Impersonate-User

parameters.description: Works only with custom setup of cluster. Allow impersonation of test group (Required if Impersonate-User is set)
parameters.name: Impersonate-Group

adGroups.description: AdGroups the groups that should be able to access the application

creator.description: ApplicationOwner of the application (email). Can be a single person or a shared group email

machineUser.description: MachineUser is on/off toggler of machine user for the application

name.description: ApplicationName the unique name of the Radix application

owner.description: ApplicationOwner of the application (email). Can be a single person or a shared group email

privateKey.description:
PrivateKey the private part of the deploy key set or returned
after successful application

publicKey.description:
PublicKey the public part of the deploy key set or returned
after successful application

sharedSecret.description: SharedSecret the shared secret of the webhook
